sentence: Unilever PLC ( UL ) will begin trading ex-dividend on February 05, 2014.
A cash dividend payment of $0.3654 per share is scheduled to be paid on March 12, 2014.
Shareholders who purchased UL stock prior to the ex-dividend date are eligible for the cash dividend payment.
This represents an -0.65% decrease from the prior quarter.
The previous trading day's last sale of UL was $38.01, representing a -13.38% decrease from the 52 week high of $43.88 and a 1.63% increase over the 52 week low of $37.40.
UL is a part of the Basic Industries sector, which includes companies such as Procter & Gamble Company ( PG ) and Unilever NV ( UN ).
Zacks Investment Research reports UL's forecasted earnings growth in 2014 as 1.88%, compared to an industry average of 8%.
For more information on the declaration, record and payment dates, visit the UL Dividend History page.
Our Dividend Calendar has the full list of stocks that have an ex-dividend today.
